original: Executes an Attack with +4 bonus to Damage
translate: Executes an Attack with +4 bonus to Damage

original: Executes an Attack that automatically scores a Critical Hit if successful
translate: Executes an Attack that automatically scores a Critical Hit if successful

original: The Target gets the Marked Condition which confers a -2 penalty to Dodge for the rest of the encounter
translate: The Marked Condition is applied to the Target, which confers a -2 penalty to Dodge for the rest of the encounter

original: The character makes a ranged attack
translate: The character makes a ranged attack

original: If that attack is successful, they may make another, free attack
translate: If that attack is successful, they may make another, free attack

original: Perform an attack that pushes your opponent back one square if successfull
translate: If successful, performs an attack that pushes the target back by one square

original: You gain the ability to hide whilst in Combat
translate: You gain the ability to enter stealth during Combat

original: Attacking whilst hidden triggers the Backstab attack
translate: Attacking whilst hidden triggers the Backstab attack

original: Allows the character to perform Backstab Attacks against voulnerable targets
translate: Allows the character to perform Backstab Attacks against vulnerable targets

original: Disengaging from Melee does not cause your turn to end
translate: Disengaging from Melee does not cause your turn to end

original: Swapping Places with allies not longer causes your Turn to end
translate: Swapping Places with allies not longer causes your turn to end

original: Allows the character to begin studying schools of spellcasting
translate: Allows the character to begin studying schools of spellcasting

original: To learn spells, pick and invest in one or more such schools
translate: To learn spells, pick and invest in one or more such schools

original: Doubles the chance of recovering a spent arrow after combat
translate: Doubles the chance of recovering an already loosed arrow after combat

original: While wielding a shield, get a dodge bonus for adjacent allies
translate: While wielding a shield, get a dodge bonus for adjacent allies

original: Bonus is +1 per ally up to a maximum of the Phalanx Bonus attribute value (typically
translate: Bonus is +1 per ally, with a maximum equal to the Shield Wall Bonus attribute value (typically

original: You can use Ranged Weapons even when in Melee
translate: Allows the use of Ranged Weapons when engaged in Melee combat

original: The first time you take Wound Hit point Damage each combat, you automatically regain 30-40 Attunement Points
translate: In each combat, the first time Wound Hit point damage is suffered, you regenerate 30-40 Attunement Points

original: When scoring a Backstab hit using a Light Weapon, the targets gets a random injury Condition
translate: When scoring a Backstab hit using a Light Weapon, the target gets a random injury Condition

original: Critical Hits with an Axe causes Injury Conditions
translate: Your Critical Hits with an Axe cause Injury Conditions

original: Your Critical Hits using Blades cause Bleeding on your target
translate: Your Critical Hits using Blades cause your target to Bleed

original: Scoring a Critical Hit with a Light Blade causes you to restore 1 Attack
translate: Your Critical Hits with a Light Blade immediately bestow you 1 additional Attack

original: If you score a Critical Hit with a Bow, you immediately regain 1 attack
translate: Your Critical Hits with a Bow immediately bestow you 1 Attack

original: Critical Hits with a Club causes The Injured Leg condition
translate: Your Critical Hits with a Club cause the target to gain the Injured Leg condition

original: Dodging a Melee Attack whilst armed causes you to deal a small amont of Slashing Damage to your attacker
translate: Dodging a Melee Attack, weapon in hand, causes a small amount of Slashing Damage to be dealt to your attacker

original: Your unarmed attack may cause disease in the target
translate: Your unarmed attack may cause disease in the target

original: The gruesomeness of your Axe-Kill causes the Fear condition in all opponents who can see it
translate: The gruesome ferocity of your Axe-Kills makes all foes who witness it Fearful

original: Killing an opponent using a Heavy Melee Weapon restores 1 Attack
translate: Killing an opponent using a Heavy Melee Weapon restores 1 Attack

original: When killing an Opponent in Armed or Unarmed Melee combat, all Allies who witness the kill get the Inspired Condition for 1 Turn
translate: When killing an Opponent in Melee combat, all Allies who witness it gain the Inspired Condition for 1 Turn

original: Killing a Marked Target, heals the party a small amount
translate: When killing a Marked Target, the party is healed by a small amount

original: When killing a Marked target, all Allies who witness the kill get the Inspired Condition for 1 Turn
translate: When killing a Marked Target, all Allies who witness the kill get the Inspired Condition for 1 Turn

original: Whilst wielding a shield, dodging a melee attack causes you to deal 1-4 Blunt damage to your attacker
translate: Whilst wielding a shield, dodging a melee attack causes you to deal 1-4 Blunt damage to your attacker

original: Your Charges cause 1-3 additional Blunt Damage
translate: Your Charges cause 1-3 additional Blunt Damage

original: The first time you're Wounded each combat, you automatically hide
translate: Each combat, the first time you're Wounded, you automatically become hidden

original: The first time you take Wound Hit point Damage each combat, you automatically regain 12-18 Vitality Hit Points
translate: Each combat, the first time Wound Hit point Damage is suffered, you regenerate 12-18 Vitality Hit Points
